answer.p: blojsom is an acronym for (blo)gging in (j)ava ... (so)mewhat ... (m)aybe. I was looking for a way to play off the name, blosxom, blojsom's not-so-distant "relative", and blojsom stuck.
Phonetically, I guess it would be bloj-sum.

faq.question: How do I create my first blog entry?

answer.p: blojsom renders your blog based on what files it finds in the directory you set as your blog-home (see installation). In this directory, each individual file is treated as a seperate blog entry. You can control which files are processed and which are ignored using the blog-file-extentions and blog-directory-filter entries in /WEB-INF/blojsom.properties.

faq.question: How do I create different blog categories?

answer.p: All you have to do is simply create new directories underneath your blog-home directory and blojsom will automatically recognize them as categories. You can further control the categories using optional meta-data, an example is a more descriptive name for the category. See customization for more details.
